briefdescription.para: Allocate a new heap and return handle to it.
In: Heap into which item is to be inserted
In: According to item entered in sorted heap
Insert a new item into the given heap.
Like heap_top but also pop the top item off the heap.
In: Heap whose topmost item is to be returned
Out: Data pointer associated with the topmost item
Out: Value associated with the topmost item
Return the topmost item in the heap.

detaileddescription.para: Return value: 1 if heap is not empty and the topmost value is returned; 0 if heap is empty; -1 if some error occurred.

briefdescription.para: Remove an item from the heap.
Return the number of items in the heap.
Destroy the given heap; free the heap nodes.

detaileddescription.para: NOTE: Data pointers in the nodes are NOT freed. Return value: 0 if successful, -1 otherwise.
